thread.title: What’s Driving Merger and Acquisition Activity?
thread.title_full: What’s Driving Merger and Acquisition Activity? - WSJ

author: Willa Plank
title: What’s Driving Merger and Acquisition Activity?
text:
The U.S. continues to be the top area for global M&A, surpassing Europe, which hasn’t rebounded as strongly since the recession. Driving a large portion of mergers and acquisitions is the health-care market, as drug makers, health insurers and others seek scale to better compete. Track merger activity online at: WSJ.com/MoneyBeat
Write to Willa Plank at willa.plank@wsj.com... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
